list-item.p: Yes—Mechanical, chemical, or enzymatic disintegration of tissues and organs is required in primary cell culture.
Yes—Secondary cultures are used in the study of transformed cells as these cultures maintain their cellular characteristics.
No—For testing the purity, one should use fluorescent staining PCR or ELISA.
No—IFN-β is used in the treatment of multiple sclerosis.
Yes—It is an inhibitor of vascular endothelial growth factor.
No—Passage effect leads to viral instability.
No—Stem cells can differentiate into other kind of cell types.
Yes—Microfluidic devices also help in investigating characteristics of 3D cell culture.
Yes—Chambers of organ-on-a-chip devices are continuously infused with living cells.
Yes—Martigel from BD biosciences can be used to coat the culture plate.
